title: When learning Russian should I learn to write in print or cursive? Which is more commonly used? - Quora

response.answer_text: “When learning Russian ‘’ should you learn in print or curasive? Well it depends on why you are learning the language .If you intend to use it for speaking purposes & reading only I recommend - print. If you need to aquire writing skills - both print and curasive . Which is commonly used? I may be wrong but it seems - print. If you are keen on learning any foreign language — Try to speak in that language no matter how many mistakes you make or how people laugh at you. Good luck in your learning process.
depending on the destination. Technical University ask/trains their students write in print as opposed to humanitarian in cursive. But all of them typing last 10 years.
